                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Web service to approve or reject a task

        request - HttpServletRequest object for web service
        pid - object Id of Inbox Task object
        action - "Approve" or "Reject" to decide on the task action
        Comment - Text for comment on Task

        Response response code

                                java.lang.String shownFDAWindow)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Web service to fetch completed tasks
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest object for web service
        taskId - object Id of Task
        routeId - object Id of Route
        comments - Text to add on Tasks as comments
        getCommentsFromTaskId - var to decide on certain action
        taskStatus - flag to get Task Status
        flag - flas to other task details
        shownFDAWindow - flag to display Approval Signature dialog box
        Returns:
        Response response code
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when operation fails
